discourse_list.title: Updating "Eth1" and "Eth2" categories, tags, etc. to "execution layer" "consensus layer"

content.content: This relates to recent changes proposed to naming conventions, generally that with the upcoming merge we label the layers after their purpose as opposed to series. Categories: Ethereum 1.x Ring → Execution Layer (this topic is general and often involves execution layer research, perhaps it could be described w/ WG or Research?) Tags: eth2 → consensus-layer eth1.x → execution-layer eth1-eth2-merger → the-merge OR the-merge-2021
LGTM, doc with more context is available here: The Great Renaming - HackMD I’d favour “the-merge” over “the-merge-2021”
